title: Anatoliy Shepel
text:
Anatoliy Mykolayovych Shepel (, ; born on 12 December 1949) is a former <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> football player.
International career.
Shepel played his only game for the <a href="Soviet%20Union%20national%20football%20team">USSR</a> on 20 May 1974 in a friendly against <a href="Czechoslovakia%20national%20football%20team">Czechoslovakia</a>.
